About.Hours & facilities: Open by appointment. Reference assistance available by mail and by telephone. Copying services for original records to A3.

About.Access: 3 weeks' advance notice of visit required. Proof of identity required. Closed period of 6 years applies to most records.

About.Acquisition focus: Material related to the works of the Sisters of Mercy, North Sydney - ie specific schools, hospitals, welfare institutions. (95% in-house).

About.Major holdings: Sisters of Mercy, North Sydney: Register of Sisters - names of sisters and parents, date of entry, death, place of origin 1870- .
